title: 70s LP Font
content:
I started with Franklin Gothic Extra Condensed and Chalet Comprime Hong Kong 80 and both are close...but not quite nailing it. Both seem too tall. Any thoughts?

Thanks as always...!

comments.content: Based on the 3 & 8, it almost looks like Univers Bold Condensed...
